data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The match is underway at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
In the minute 5, Goal! Jamie Lindsay gives Rotherham a 1-0 lead.
Garry Monk (Sheffield Wed) is making a first substitution, with Liam Palmer replacing Aden Flint.
Liam Palmer for Sheffield Wed has been booked by Jarred Gillett and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 26, Jamal Blackman (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Rotherham.
Tom Lees (Sheffield Wed) has been sent off!
In the minute 40, Daniel Barlaser smashes in a penalty at AESSEAL New York Stadium. The score is now 2-0.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Great finish from Jamie Lindsay to give Rotherham a 3-0 lead.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Josh Windass is replacing Callum Paterson for Sheffield Wed at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
Michael Smith is on a sub for Daniel Barlaser for Rotherham.
In the minute 71, Rotherham's Mikel Miller has been booked in Rotherham.
Adam Reach is replacing Jack Marriott for the away team.
Rotherham make their second substitution with George Hirst replacing Freddie Ladapo.
In the minute 73, At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Moses Odubajo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
George Hirst (Rotherham) has received a yellow card from Jarred Gillett.
Paul Warne is making the team's third substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Shaun MacDonald replacing Mikel Miller.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
